About.Title: About the association
About.Parag: The association was created in 2020. The objective is to reinforce communication and cooperation between citizens
In this purpose, any person who is member of the association can propose an activity. The proposal will be evaluated by the committe.

Activities.Title: Our activities
Activities.Parag: Currently, 5 activities are available for the persons living in the village
The committee is examining several propositions of activities.
